```{r}
function1 <- function(filename) {
  # Filters arransimd into individual shape files
  ggplot(filename) +
  geom_sf(aes(fill = Percentile)) +
  facet_wrap('year') +
  theme(axis.text.x=element_blank(),
        axis.ticks.x=element_blank())
}
```


```{r}
function2 <-function(filename) {
  # Filters arransimd into DataZones
  (filename) <- filter(arransimd, DataZone=="(filename)")
}
```

```{r}
function2(S01004409)
```


S01004409 <- filter(arransimd, DataZone=="S01004409")
